articles.title: Viral Video: Elon Musk's Doppelganger In China Stuns Internet - NDTV
articles.description: A man from China is making waves on the Internet. Reason? His resemblance with billionaire Elon Musk. The Tesla CEO's "doppelganger" - as internet calls him - has left many social media users surprised.
articles.content:
Picture shows a Chinese doppelanger of Elon Musk, the Tesla CEO.
